div1.p: Austin to colonists, April 12, 1827. Election notice.

An Election will be held by the Inhabitants of this Colony in the Town of San felepe de Austin on Sunday the 22d of this month for the purpose of choosing electors to meet in San Antonio on the 13 day of May next in order to elect two representatives for the State Legislature
